name: Squidward's Shadow
description:
Welcome to Squidward's Shadow

Do not take this parody seriously of the incredible SpongeBob

franchise, which is owned by Viacom International inc.

I don't own any rights to the characters in the game, 

This game was made with the Unity game engine.

It's all in good fun, so please don't take

this game too seriously.

I hope

 you will love my work, this took me 3 weeks,

This game is still in development So if you find bugs please report them I'd do my best to fix them

so enjoy it :)
